tasks.label: npm: test
tasks.detail: npm run build && node --input-type=module -e "import fs from 'fs/promises'; import path from 'path'; import { spawnSync } from 'child_process'; const root = path.join('dist', 'tests'); const exts = ['.test.js', '.spec.js']; const walk = async (dir) => { let out = []; try { for (const ent of await fs.readdir(dir, { withFileTypes: true })) { const p = path.join(dir, ent.name); if (ent.isDirectory()) out = out.concat(await walk(p)); else if (exts.some((ext) => ent.name.endsWith(ext))) out.push(p); } } catch {} return out; }; const files = await walk(root); if (!files.length) { console.log('No compiled tests found'); process.exit(0); } const res = spawnSync(process.execPath, ['--test', ...files], { stdio: 'inherit' }); process.exit(res.status ?? 1);"
